committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill for the transfer of certain interests in lands in Socorro County, New Mexico, to the New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology, Socorro, New Mexico.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey, for a fee, to the New Mexico Insitute of Mining and Technology, Socorro, New Mexico, specified lands in Socorro County, New Mexico, to be used for educational and research purposes. Reserves to the United States all mineral rights in such lands and a right of reversion should such lands be used for other than the designated purposes.

titles.title: A bill for the transfer of certain interests in lands in Socorro County, New Mexico, to the New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology, Socorro, New Mexico.
